text: Dangnan khwam wibati ca dikæ br rda phu thi kheiyn khamphar khun dwy mux khxng kh tnxeng læw klaw wa nihæla ma ca kxallxh pheux phwk khea ca di na man pi lækpeliyn kab rakha xan leknxy dangnan khwam wibati ca dikæ phwk khea neuxngcak sing thi mux khxng phwk khea di kheiyn khun læa khwam wibati nan ca dikæ phwk khea neuxngcak sing thi phwk khea sæwngha wi
